properties.entry: UPDATE RESTAURANT SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE RES_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RES_NO , RS.RES_NAME , CEO , PERMIT_NO , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , PHONE , PARKING , LONGTITUDE , LATITUDE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , NVL(BREAK_S, '') "BREAK_S" , NVL(BREAK_E, '') "BREAK_E" , FOOD_CT FROM RESTAURANT RS WHERE RS.RES_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(REVIEW_NO) FROM REVIEW WHERE RES_NO = ? ) "REVIEW_COUNT" , ( SELECT AVG(STAR) FROM REVIEW WHERE RES_NO = ? ) "REVIEW_AVG" , COUNT FROM RESTAURANT RS WHERE RS.RES_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MENU_NO , RS.RES_NO , MENU_NAME , PRICE , MENU_DES , M_IMG FROM RESTAURANT RS JOIN MENU M ON (RS.RES_NO = M.RES_NO) WHERE RS.RES_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT REVIEW_NO , RE.RES_NO , RE.USER_NO , BOOK_NO , REVIEW_CONTENT , RE.STAR , CREATE_DATE , RE.MODIFY_DATE , GOOD , RE.COUNT , NICKNAME FROM REVIEW RE JOIN TB_USER U ON (U.USER_NO = RE.USER_NO) WHERE RE.RES_NO = ? AND RE.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT RES_NO , REF_BNO , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND RES_NO = ? AND BOARD_TYPE = 'R' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT POINT_NOW FROM (SELECT NVL(POINT_NOW, 0) "POINT_NOW" FROM POINT WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY POINT_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

INSERT INTO BOOK ( BOOK_NO , USER_NO , RES_NO , BOOK_NAME , BOOK_PHONE , BOOK_DATE , BOOK_TIME , PEOPLE , EMAIL , REQUEST , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_BKNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'B' )
INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( PAY_NO , BOOK_NO , RES_NO , USER_NO , PAY_POINT , PAY_TOTAL , PAY_OP , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_PMNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BKNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'Y' )

INSERT INTO POINT ( POINT_NO , PAY_NO , USER_NO , RES_NO , POINT_NAME , STATUS , POINT_TRADE , POINT_NOW ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PMNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , 'U' , ? , (SELECT POINT_NOW - ? FROM (SELECT NVL(POINT_NOW, 0) "POINT_NOW" FROM POINT WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY POINT_NOW DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) )

INSERT INTO POINT ( POINT_NO , PAY_NO , USER_NO , RES_NO , POINT_NAME , STATUS , POINT_TRADE , POINT_NOW ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_PMNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? , 'B' , ? , (SELECT POINT_NOW + ? FROM (SELECT NVL(POINT_NOW, 0) "POINT_NOW" FROM POINT WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY POINT_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) )

SELECT B.BOOK_NO , B.USER_NO , B.RES_NO , RES_NAME , BOOK_NAME , BOOK_PHONE , BOOK_DATE , BOOK_TIME , PEOPLE , B.EMAIL , REQUEST , B.STATUS , B.MODIFY_DATE , BOOK_A , PAY_TOTAL , PAY_POINT , PAY_OP , R_IMG FROM BOOK B JOIN RESTAURANT R ON (B.RES_NO = R.RES_NO) JOIN PAYMENT P ON (B.BOOK_NO = P.BOOK_NO) WHERE B.USER_NO = ? AND B.STATUS IN ('B', 'D') ORDER BY B.BOOK_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOOK_NO , RES_NAME , BOOK_NAME , BOOK_PHONE , BOOK_DATE , BOOK_TIME , PEOPLE , NVL(B.EMAIL, '') "EMAIL" , REQUEST , B.STATUS , B.MODIFY_DATE , BOOK_A , PAY_TOTAL , PAY_POINT , PAY_OP , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , LONGTITUDE , LATITUDE , PAY_DATE , POINT_TRADE , POINT_NOW , PHONE "res_phone" FROM BOOK B JOIN RESTAURANT RE ON (B.RES_NO = RE.RES_NO) JOIN PAYMENT P ON (B.BOOK_NO = P.BOOK_NO) JOIN POINT PO ON (P.PAY_NO = PO.PAY_NO) WHERE B.BOOK_NO = ?
UPDATE BOOK SET STATUS = 'C' WHERE BOOK_NO = ?

SELECT B.USER_NO , B.RES_NO , P.STATUS , PAY_TOTAL , PAY_POINT , PAY_OP , PAY_NO , RES_NAME FROM BOOK B JOIN PAYMENT P ON (B.BOOK_NO = P.BOOK_NO) JOIN restaurant R ON (B.RES_NO = R.RES_NO) WHERE B.BOOK_NO = ?
INSERT INTO PAYMENT ( PAY_NO , BOOK_NO , RES_NO , USER_NO , PAY_POINT , PAY_TOTAL , PAY_OP , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_PMNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , - ? , - ? , ? , 'C' )

INSERT INTO POINT ( POINT_NO , PAY_NO , USER_NO , RES_NO , POINT_NAME , STATUS , POINT_TRADE , POINT_NOW ) VALUES ( SEQ_PNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'C' , SELECT NVL(SUM(-POINT_TRADE), 0) FROM POINT WHERE PAY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'B'; FROM POINT WHERE PAY_NO = ? , SELECT POINT_NOW - SELECT NVL(SUM((SELECT SUM(-POINT_TRADE) FROM POINT WHERE PAY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'B') + (SELECT SUM(POINT_TRADE) FROM POINT WHERE PAY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'U')), 0) "POINT_NOW" FROM POINT WHERE PAY_NO = ? AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY POINT_NO ASC
